body:
This is definitely the right way to do this: we should have done it this way to begin with. Changing the APIs is lame, but fine.

In the future we could get all these benefits without changing the API by saying:

``` python
action_name = serializers.SlugRelatedField(
    source='action', slug_field='name', queryset=Action.objects.all())
```

(ie: add a `source` parameter). We don't need to do this, just something to keep in mind if we have to do this on an API we've declared "done".
